channel.title: Will somone please help me with this... last thing b4 i finally can run a rsps
channel.description:
as somone of you know i have trouble with running rsps under ubuntu.. and now my last question is about compiling
when i run my compiler i get this error
[code] javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press Return key to continue: [/code]
will somone please help me with this...
and one more thing.. i use the same code for my client and that compiler works great :)

item.title: Will somone please help me with this... last thing b4 i finally can run a rsps
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

@echo off

"/home/knuteirik/.wine/dosdevices/c:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_21/bin/javac.exe" *.java -cp .;./lib/sbbi-upnplib-1.0.4.jar;./lib/jxta.jar

pause

this is what i have as my others compilers that works but on this one it doesn’t work

please tell me how to get this work

Read full topic
item.source: Will somone please help me with this... last thing b4 i finally can run a rsps

item.title: Will somone please help me with this... last thing b4 i finally can run a rsps

item.title: Will somone please help me with this... last thing b4 i finally can run a rsps
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

replace your compiler code with this:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
Make sure you have jdk for this. To check, goto:

C:/Program Files/Java

Read full topic
item.source: Will somone please help me with this... last thing b4 i finally can run a rsps
